txt.en:
The bounty notice reads:

'A ferocious jackal called Uzukar has been spotted near Urgudag to the west. Traders in the area are in need of someone to get rid of this beast.

'Inform Neshurga in Ub Nishir if you complete this request.'
A bounty notice in Ub Nishir has asked for someone to defeat a ferocious jackal known as Uzukar who has been spotted near Urgudag to the west.
'The traders will be relieved to hear of Uzukar's defeat.\n\n'You have their thanks and mine as well. The reward they provided is yours to claim.'
A bounty notice asks you to defeat Uzukar, a ferocious jackal that has been spotted roaming near Urgudag to the west.
Return to Neshurga in Ub Nishir north of Maur√ªsh and inform him that you have completed the bounty and defeated Uzukar.
Return to Neshurga and inform him of Uzukar's defeat
